text: Tharushah (, Sindhi: ٺارو شاھ جنڪشن ريلوي اسٽيشن) is located in Tharu Shah Town, Sindh, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Naushahro Feroze District Category:Defunct railway stations in Pakistan
title: Tharushah Junction railway station
